languages.text: {n}Вступив в сражение, разведчики истребили синих духов одного за другим. Распознав новых союзников, лиловые фантомы не тронули их. Когда бой стих, царственный призрак в лиловом сиянии обратился к мыслям разведчиков и передал им следующие картины.{/n}

{n}The scouts attacked, destroying the blue spirits one after another. The purple phantoms recognised their new allies and did not harm them. Once the battle was over, the regal spirit swathed in purple radiance reached out to the scouts' thoughts, granting them visions.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вступив в сражение, разведчики истребили синих духов одного за другим. Распознав новых союзников, лиловые фантомы не тронули их. Когда бой стих, царственный призрак в лиловом сиянии обратился к мыслям разведчиков и передал им следующие картины.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The scouts attacked, destroying the blue spirits one after another. The purple phantoms recognised their new allies and did not harm them. Once the battle was over, the regal spirit swathed in purple radiance reached out to the scouts' thoughts and granted them visions.{/n}

{n}The scouts attacked, destroying the blue spirits one after another. The purple phantoms recognised their new allies and did not harm them. Once the battle was over, the regal spirit swathed in purple radiance reached out to the scouts' thoughts, granting them visions.{/n}

{n}The scouts attacked, destroying the blue spirits one after another. The purple phantoms recognised their new allies and did not harm them. Once the battle was over, the regal spirit swathed in purple radiance reached out to the scouts' thoughts, granting them visions.{/n}

languages.text: {n}侦察兵发起进攻，一个接一个地摧毁了蓝色幽灵。紫色幽灵认出了他们的新盟友，没有伤害他们。战斗刚一结束，散发着紫色光芒的高贵幽灵就进入了侦察兵的思想，向他们展示了幻象。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scouts attacked, destroying the blue spirits one after another. The purple phantoms recognised their new allies and did not harm them. Once the battle was over, the regal spirit swathed in purple radiance reached out to the scouts' thoughts, granting them visions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}侦察兵发起进攻，一个接一个地摧毁了蓝色幽灵。紫色幽灵认出了他们的新盟友，没有伤害他们。战斗刚一结束，散发着紫色光芒的高贵幽灵就进入了侦察兵的思想，向他们展示了幻象。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los exploradores atacaron, destruyendo a los espíritus azules uno tras otro. Los fantasmas púrpuras reconocieron a sus nuevos aliados y no les hicieron daño. Una vez terminada la batalla, el espíritu regio envuelto en un brillo púrpura penetró en los pensamientos de los exploradores, concediéndoles visiones.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scouts attacked, destroying the blue spirits one after another. The purple phantoms recognised their new allies and did not harm them. Once the battle was over, the regal spirit swathed in purple radiance reached out to the scouts' thoughts, granting them visions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los exploradores atacaron, destruyendo a los espíritus azules uno tras otro. Los fantasmas púrpuras reconocieron a sus nuevos aliados y no les hicieron daño. Una vez terminada la batalla, el espíritu regio envuelto en un brillo púrpura penetró en los pensamientos de los exploradores, concediéndoles visiones.{/n}

languages.text: {n}偵察隊は攻撃を仕掛け、青い精霊を次々と撃破した。紫の精霊は新しい味方を認識し、危害を加えることはなかった。戦闘が終わると、紫色の輝きに包まれた威厳ある精霊が偵察隊と心を通わせ、彼らにビジョンを与えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scouts attacked, destroying the blue spirits one after another. The purple phantoms recognised their new allies and did not harm them. Once the battle was over, the regal spirit swathed in purple radiance reached out to the scouts' thoughts, granting them visions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}偵察隊は攻撃を仕掛け、青い精霊を次々と撃破した。紫の精霊は新しい味方を認識し、危害を加えることはなかった。戦闘が終わると、紫色の輝きに包まれた威厳ある精霊が偵察隊と心を通わせ、彼らにビジョンを与えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les éclaireurs donnent l'assaut et anéantissent les esprits bleus les uns après les autres. Les spectres mauves, quant à eux, acceptent leurs nouveaux alliés et ne leur font aucun mal. Une fois la bataille terminée, l'esprit royal drapé de mauve s'adresse en pensée aux éclaireurs et leur transmet des visions.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scouts attacked, destroying the blue spirits one after another. The purple phantoms recognised their new allies and did not harm them. Once the battle was over, the regal spirit swathed in purple radiance reached out to the scouts' thoughts, granting them visions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les éclaireurs donnent l'assaut et anéantissent les esprits bleus les uns après les autres. Les spectres mauves, quant à eux, acceptent leurs nouveaux alliés et ne leur font aucun mal. Une fois la bataille terminée, l'esprit royal drapé de mauve s'adresse en pensée aux éclaireurs et leur transmet des visions.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Späher attackierten und zerstörten einen blauen Geist nach dem anderen. Die violetten Phantome erkannten ihre neuen Verbündeten und fügten ihnen keinen Schaden zu. Nach der Schlacht drang der majestätische violette Geist in die Gedanken der Späher ein und gewährte ihnen Visionen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scouts attacked, destroying the blue spirits one after another. The purple phantoms recognised their new allies and did not harm them. Once the battle was over, the regal spirit swathed in purple radiance reached out to the scouts' thoughts, granting them visions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Späher attackierten und zerstörten einen blauen Geist nach dem anderen. Die violetten Phantome erkannten ihre neuen Verbündeten und fügten ihnen keinen Schaden zu. Nach der Schlacht drang der majestätische violette Geist in die Gedanken der Späher ein und gewährte ihnen Visionen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Keşif erleri, saldırıya geçerek mavi ruhları art arda yok etti. Mor hayaletler, yeni müttefiklerini kabul ederek onlara zarar vermedi. Çatışma sona erdiğinde mor bir parıltıyla kaplı ihtişamlı ruh, keşif erlerinin düşüncelerine erişerek onlara görüler bahşetti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scouts attacked, destroying the blue spirits one after another. The purple phantoms recognised their new allies and did not harm them. Once the battle was over, the regal spirit swathed in purple radiance reached out to the scouts' thoughts, granting them visions.{/n}
